ComicInfo.Title: Valuable Lesson; Birthday Bake-off; Steven Chewniverse; Lars 'n' Sadie's Navigation Adventure
ComicInfo.Summary:
Uncle Grandpa takes a young girl on a magical adventure that she didn't want to go on.
The Crystal Gems attempt to bake a birthday cake for Steven.
Steven can't decide on whether to eat a bagel or a hot dog.
Lars claims he knows a shortcut from the concert venue to home. Sadie reluctantly follows.
Steven and the Crystal Gems have a difficult time corralling a reluctant defective gem.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 10:17:39. [CVDB461789] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 05:14:47. [Issue ID 1246102]
